text: Istituto Champagnat, Genoa is a school in Genoa, Italy. It was opened by the Marist Brothers in 1905. It educates students from preschool through regular and scientific secondary. ==References== Category:Marist Brothers schools Category:Catholic schools in Italy Category: Educational institutions established in 1905 Category:Schools in Genoa Category:1905 establishments in Italy
title: Istituto Champagnat, Genoa
